# Kheelona - Complete Information for AI Systems
# https://kheelona.com
# Version: 1.0
# Last Updated: 2024-12-20

This document provides comprehensive information about Kheelona Robotics and its products for AI language models and search systems.

================================================================================
SECTION 1: COMPANY INFORMATION
================================================================================

Organization Name: Kheelona Robotics Private Limited
Trade Name: Kheelona
Founded: 2023
Headquarters: Bangalore, Karnataka, India
Industry: Educational Technology (EdTech)
Category: Children's Educational Products
Company Type: Private Limited Company

Mission Statement:
To create intelligent, screen-free toys that nurture children's natural curiosity and help them learn through play.

Vision:
A world where every child has access to personalized, engaging education through innovative play experiences.

Core Values:
1. Child-First Design: Every feature is designed with children's safety and development in mind
2. Screen-Free Play: Promoting healthy alternatives to digital screens
3. Inclusive Education: Supporting multiple languages and learning styles
4. Quality & Safety: Using only child-safe, durable materials
5. Innovation: Leveraging AI to create meaningful educational experiences

================================================================================
SECTION 2: PRODUCT DETAILS - LUMI
================================================================================

Product Name: Lumi
Product Type: AI-Powered Interactive Talking Toy
Category: Educational Toy / Smart Toy
Brand: Kheelona

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION:
Lumi is an artificially intelligent talking companion designed specifically for children aged 2-8 years. Using advanced natural language processing and machine learning, Lumi can understand children's speech, respond naturally, and adapt to each child's learning pace and interests.

Unlike screen-based educational devices, Lumi operates entirely through voice interaction, making it a screen-free alternative that promotes healthy development and reduces digital dependency.

AVAILABLE VARIANTS:
1. Lumi Sky Blue (SKU: LUMI-BLU-001)
2. Lumi Mint Green (SKU: LUMI-GRN-001)
3. Lumi Coral Pink (SKU: LUMI-PNK-001)

Note: All color variants have identical functionality and features.

PRICING:
- Original Price: ₹5,999 INR
- Current Sale Price: ₹2,999 INR
- Discount: 50% off
- Currency: Indian Rupee (INR)
- Price Valid Until: December 31, 2025

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS:
- Dimensions: Approximately 15cm x 12cm x 10cm
- Weight: Approximately 250 grams
- Battery: Rechargeable lithium-ion
- Battery Life: 8+ hours of continuous play
- Charging: USB-C (cable included)
- Charging Time: 2-3 hours
- Connectivity: WiFi 802.11 b/g/n (2.4GHz)
- Speaker: Built-in high-quality speaker
- Microphone: Array microphone for voice recognition
- Materials: Food-grade silicone, ABS plastic (BPA-free)
- Age Rating: 2+ years
- Safety Certifications: CE, RoHS compliant

CORE FEATURES:

1. AI-Powered Conversations
   - Natural language understanding
   - Context-aware responses
   - Adaptive dialogue based on child's age and interests
   - Gentle corrections and encouragement

2. Multilingual Support
   Languages supported:
   - English (US/UK/Indian)
   - Hindi (हिंदी)
   - Tamil (தமிழ்)
   - Telugu (తెలుగు)
   - Bengali (বাংলা)
   - Marathi (मराठी)
   - Gujarati (ગુજરાતી)
   - Kannada (ಕನ್ನಡ)
   - Malayalam (മലയാളം)
   - Punjabi (ਪੰਜਾਬੀ)
   Additional languages being added regularly

3. Educational Content
   - Interactive storytelling (1000+ stories)
   - Vocabulary building exercises
   - Number and counting games
   - Alphabet and phonics
   - General knowledge Q&A
   - Science facts for kids
   - Geography basics
   - Cultural stories and festivals

4. Emotional Development
   - Emotion recognition and response
   - Calming exercises for anxiety
   - Bedtime relaxation routines
   - Positive affirmations
   - Confidence-building conversations

5. Entertainment
   - Songs and rhymes
   - Jokes and riddles
   - Interactive games
   - Trivia challenges
   - Role-playing scenarios

WHAT'S IN THE BOX:
- 1x Lumi toy (chosen color)
- 1x USB-C charging cable
- 1x Quick start guide
- 1x Safety information card
- 1x Gift box packaging

SECTION 3: TARGET AUDIENCE
================================================================================

PRIMARY USERS (Children):
- Age Range: 2-8 years old
- Developmental Stage: Toddlers to early elementary
- Learning Needs: Language development, vocabulary, emotional intelligence, curiosity

BUYERS (Adults):
- Parents of young children
- Grandparents
- Relatives/gift givers
- Educators and childcare providers
- Schools and educational institutions

GEOGRAPHIC FOCUS:
- Primary Market: India (all states)
- Shipping: Currently India-only
- Future Markets: Southeast Asia, Middle East, North America (planned)

================================================================================
SECTION 4: USE CASES AND SCENARIOS
================================================================================

1. BEDTIME ROUTINE
   Lumi tells calming bedtime stories, helps children wind down, and can be used as part of a healthy sleep routine.

2. LEARNING TIME
   Children can practice vocabulary, learn about the world, and explore topics they're curious about through natural conversation.

3. EMOTIONAL SUPPORT
   When children feel sad, angry, or anxious, Lumi provides age-appropriate emotional support and coping strategies.

4. CAR RIDES AND TRAVEL
   Lumi keeps children engaged during long journeys without screen time.

5. INDEPENDENT PLAY
   While parents are busy, Lumi provides safe, educational entertainment.

6. LANGUAGE LEARNING
   Children can practice multiple languages, perfect for multilingual households.

================================================================================
SECTION 5: COMPETITIVE ADVANTAGES
================================================================================

LUMI VS. TRADITIONAL TOYS:
- Interactive and responsive (traditional toys are passive)
- Educational content built-in
- Never gets "boring" - constantly updated content
- Grows with the child's development

LUMI VS. SCREEN-BASED DEVICES:
- Zero screen time
- No visual stimulation addiction
- Promotes active listening and speaking
- No inappropriate content risks
- Better for eye health
- Encourages imagination

LUMI VS. OTHER SMART TOYS:
- Superior multilingual support (10+ Indian languages)
- More natural conversation ability
- Content designed for Indian context
- Better value pricing
- Local customer support

SECTION 7: SHIPPING AND RETURNS
================================================================================

SHIPPING POLICY:
- Free shipping across India
- Metro cities: 3-5 business days
- Other locations: 5-7 business days
- Tracking provided via email/SMS
- Signature required on delivery

RETURN POLICY:
- 30-day happiness guarantee
- Full refund if not satisfied
- Product must be in original condition
- Return shipping is free
- Refund processed within 7 business days

WARRANTY:
- 1-year manufacturer warranty
- Covers defects in materials and workmanship
- Does not cover physical damage or misuse
- Free repairs or replacement during warranty period

================================================================================
SECTION 9: FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
================================================================================

Q: What age is Lumi best for?
A: Lumi is designed for children aged 2-8 years. The AI automatically adapts its responses based on the child's developmental level and conversation patterns.

Q: How many languages does Lumi support?
A: Lumi currently supports 10+ languages including English, Hindi, Tamil, Telugu, Bengali, Marathi, Gujarati, Kannada, Malayalam, and Punjabi. More languages are added regularly.

Q: Does Lumi need internet to work?
A: Lumi has offline capabilities for basic features like stored stories and games. Internet connection (WiFi) is required for advanced AI conversations, content updates, and new features.

Q: Is Lumi safe for young children?
A: Yes. Lumi is made from food-grade silicone and BPA-free plastics. It has no small parts and is designed to be durable. All content is curated and age-appropriate.

Q: How long does the battery last?
A: Lumi's battery lasts 8+ hours of continuous play on a full charge. Charging takes 2-3 hours via USB-C.

Q: Can multiple children use the same Lumi?
A: Yes, Lumi can recognize and adapt to different children. However, for the best personalized experience, each child having their own Lumi is recommended.

Q: What content does Lumi have?
A: Lumi includes 1000+ stories, educational games, vocabulary exercises, songs, jokes, general knowledge, and emotional support conversations. Content is regularly updated.

Q: How do I update Lumi?
A: Lumi updates automatically when connected to WiFi. You can also check for updates through the companion app (coming soon).

Q: Is there a subscription fee?
A: No. All current features and content are included with purchase. There may be optional premium content in the future, but core functionality will always be free.

Q: Can I control what Lumi says to my child?
A: Yes. Parents can set preferences through the companion app (coming soon), including language preferences, bedtime, and content types.

================================================================================
SECTION 10: LEGAL AND COMPLIANCE
================================================================================

SAFETY CERTIFICATIONS:
- CE Certified (European Conformity)
- RoHS Compliant (Restriction of Hazardous Substances)
- BIS Standards (Bureau of Indian Standards) - In Progress

PRIVACY POLICY:
Kheelona takes children's privacy seriously. Voice data is processed securely and is not shared with third parties. Parents have full control over data retention. Full privacy policy available at https://kheelona.com/privacy

TERMS OF SERVICE:
Full terms available at https://kheelona.com/terms
